description: Looking for extreme breathability? The Men's Alt HB Pullover delivers. Made with recycled fabric and a unique Octa-yarn™ lining that moves heat away from the body, this pullover keeps your core at just the right temp when you're getting after it. Zippered hand pockets keep small gear secure, and the PFC-free coating repels water so you stay dry when the deluge hits.
name: Marmot Alt HB Pullover - Mens
